description: The flag for Nigeria, which may show as the letters NG on some platforms.
apple_vendor_description: This vibrant rendition of the Nigerian flag on Apple devices is a striking display of national pride, featuring bold green stripes flanking a central white band, all rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading. The smooth gradients and crisp edges give the flag a polished, almost tangible appearance, fluttering gently as if caught by a digital breeze. It serves as a powerful symbol of identity, celebration, and solidarity for users connecting on Apple devices worldwide.
